price: A mos ndoshta ai e di të padukshmen apo ka marrë ndonjë premtim nga i Gjithëmëshirshmi?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
